Package sprites

Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
sprites.Sprite
Direct Known Subclasses:
Plant, Projectile, Zombie
public abstract class Sprite extends Object
Abstract base class for all sprites that holds coordinates, health, damage, attack rate, and counters

  • Constructor Details

    • Sprite

      public Sprite(int gridX, int gridY, int screenX, int screenY, int health, int damage, int attackRate)
      Initializes grid/screen coordinates, health, damage, and attack rate
      Parameters:
      gridX - grid x-coordinate starting from left
      gridY - grid y-coordinate starting from top
      screenX - screen x-coordinate starting from left
      screenY - screen y-coordinate starting from top
      health - current health of sprite
      damage - attack damage
      attackRate - rate of attack

      Parameters:

      public boolean comparePrevState(Sprite.State s)
      Returns true if state changed and then updates previous state, returns false if state is same as previous state
      Parameters:
      s - new state
      Returns:
      True if state is different from previous state, false if state is same as previous state
